modName: Creatures of the Hell - Mounts and Followers
summary: With this mod you can summon Creatures of the Hell - Mounts and Followers  wherever you want.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000] [b][size=4]Creatures of the Hell - Mounts and Followers[/size] [/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] version 3.6.1 (Mounts and Companions) and 3.6BIS (NO Companions)

[/b][/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/VpPC2St.gif[/img]

>->->->->->->[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=334550armoredvampiredog2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/334550armoredvampiredog2.jpg[/img][/url]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=151851MountDraugrdoggyFollowerchild.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/151851MountDraugrdoggyFollowerchild.jpg[/img][/url]

>->->->->->->->->->->->[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=955446Pirate2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/955446Pirate2.jpg[/img][/url]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<

"Creatures of the Hell" allow you to summon Pirate Sabrecat, Armored Vampire Dog, Armored Vampire Death Hound, Big Pig, SpiderWoman, Defective Lich, Bone Wheel, Death hound, Skeleton Boneman, Bone Horse, Dreugh, Demonic horse,Vampire lich, Hyena, Wild Boar, Wild Cat, Flesh Spirits, Witch Head, Draugr Doggy,Vampire brute, Namira Apostle Worm, Draugr Matron, Arpenburo, Vabriaburo, Lalorburo Mounts and (-simple-) Followers + the Spectral Mounts (Skeever, Slaughterfish, Skeleton Archer, Skeleton Warrior 2 hands, Skeleton Warrior 1 hand, Dragon Priest, Wolf, Fox), wherever you want.

You can find the 14 Followers/Companions (with speech): Harpy, Skeleton Mistman, Fire wolf, Death angel, Draman Skeleton, Draugr keeper, Flesh Spirits, Witch Head, Draugr Doggy, Child of Oblivion, Falmer Lich Vampire, Arpenburo, Vabriaburo, Lalorburo, in the Windhelm Stable and the Brandy-Mug Farm

The DLC Dawnguard is required

You can easily DISMISS when you want with an other "Spell tome:Dismiss Creatures of the Hell Summon"

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=616386MountFleshspiritsFollowerDraugrdoggy.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/616386MountFleshspiritsFollowerDraugrdoggy.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=982041MountHYENAFollowerDEATHANGEL.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/982041MountHYENAFollowerDEATHANGEL.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 34 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXX“, the “Spell tome: Summon Spectral XXX“, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Defective Lich, Arpenburo, Vabriaburo, Lalorburo and the spectral mounts)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=160466MountFleshspiritsFollowerwitchhead.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/160466MountFleshspiritsFollowerwitchhead.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=397592MountDEMONICHORSEFollowerDRAUGRKEEPER.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/397592MountDEMONICHORSEFollowerDRAUGRKEEPER.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

The "dragon" can fly when there are enemies, but not with your character...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=218337MountSKELETONBONEMANFollowerSKELETONMISTMAN.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/218337MountSKELETONBONEMANFollowerSKELETONMISTMAN.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=676803MountwitchheadFollowerwitchhead.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/676803MountwitchheadFollowerwitchhead.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Credits[/color]

[color=#ff8c00]newermind43[/color] for the mesh of the Demonic Horse

[color=#ff8c00]Grohiik [/color]for the mesh of the Draman Skeleton

[color=#ff8c00]Dogtown1[/color] for his mod “Skyrim Monster Mod“(smm) With the meshes and textures of Daedra SpiderWoman, Harpy, Death Angel (Reaper spirit) and Vampire Lich

[color=#ff8c00]GSC Gameworld[/color] for the meshes and textures of the Wildcat and the WildBoar (in smm)

[color=#ff8c00]Muppetpuppet[/color] for the textures of Hyena (in smm)

[color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshes/textures of the Flesh Spirits, Defective Lich, Bone Wheel, Bone Horse, Dreugh, Witch Head, Draugr Doggy, Child of Oblivion, Falmer Lich Vampire,Vampire brute, Namira Apostle Worm, Draugr Matron, Arpenburo, Vabriaburo, Lalorburo in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

[color=#ff8c00]tumbajamba[/color] for the Meshes of the Armored Vampire Dog and the Armored Vampire Death Hound (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]jackGa[/color] for the Mesh/Textures of the Pig/Troll in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=222035755] JG Monsters [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]HISSSSA[/color] for the Mesh/textures of the Pirate Sabrecat in his mod
[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/hissssaxmod001/download/25/HS-Rat-resource0.1.7z] hs-rat [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]testiger2[/color] for the Mesh/Textures of the HairFullextra (Pirate Sabrecat) in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=681115MountspiderwomanFollowerHarpy.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/681115MountspiderwomanFollowerHarpy.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=780629MountVAMPIRELICHFollowerFIREWOLF.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/780629MountVAMPIRELICHFollowerFIREWOLF.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=449586MountWILDBOARFollowerDRAMANSKELETON.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/449586MountWILDBOARFollowerDRAMANSKELETON.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=495515MountWILDCATFollowerHARPYDRAMANSKELETON.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/495515MountWILDCATFollowerHARPYDRAMANSKELETON.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=385543summoncreaturesofthehellmountsfollowers.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/385543summoncreaturesofthehellmountsfollowers.jpg[/img][/url]

files.name: Summon Creatures of the Hell - Mounts and Followers 3-6-1
files.fileName: Summon Creatures of the Hell - Mounts and Followers 3-6-1-30952-3-6-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in the Version 3.6.1: Minor changes (New Look for the Pirate Sabrecat + new name for the "Pig" ---->"Big Pig") + Cleaned with TesVEdit

New in the Version 3.5: Adds a Pirate Sabrecat (Mount) + Now you can summon the Defective Lich everywhere you want ! + Reduction of the size for a few textures for less CTD with some configurations

New in the Version 3.4: You can easily DISMISS when you want with an other "Spell tome:Dismiss Creatures of the Hell Summon" + adds a Pig/Troll

files.name: Summon Creatures of the Hell - Mounts 3-6BIS NO FOLLOWERS
